directions: Place dessert shells on serving platter. Spoon yogurt evenly into dessert shells (about 3 tablespoons per shell). Top with fruit.
ingredients: 2 (4 ounce) containers Yoplait® Greek 100 Whips!® Vanilla Cupcake yogurt
3/4 cup fresh fruit (such as blueberries, sliced bananas and sliced strawberries)
title: Whips!® Fruit Shortcakes
